    • 构造器详细资料

      • YuvFrame

        public YuvFrame(VideoRenderer.I420Frame i420Frame)
        Creates a YuvFrame from the provided I420Frame. Does no processing, and uses the current time as a timestamp.
        参数:
        i420Frame - Source I420Frame.

      • YuvFrame

        public YuvFrame(VideoRenderer.I420Frame i420Frame,
                int processingFlags)
        Creates a YuvFrame from the provided I420Frame. Does any processing indicated, and uses the current time as a timestamp.
        参数:
        i420Frame - Source I420Frame.
        processingFlags - Processing flags, YuvFrame.PROCESSING_NONE for no processing.

      • YuvFrame

        public YuvFrame(VideoRenderer.I420Frame i420Frame,
                int processingFlags,
                long timestamp)
        Creates a YuvFrame from the provided I420Frame. Does any processing indicated, and uses the given timestamp.
        参数:
        i420Frame - Source I420Frame.
        processingFlags - Processing flags, YuvFrame.PROCESSING_NONE for no processing.
        timestamp - The timestamp to give the frame.

    • 方法详细资料

      • fromI420Frame

        public void fromI420Frame(VideoRenderer.I420Frame i420Frame,
                          int processingFlags,
                          long timestamp)
        Replaces the data in this YuvFrame with the data from the provided frame. Will create new byte arrays to hold pixel data if necessary, or will reuse existing arrays if they're already the correct size.
        参数:
        i420Frame - Source I420Frame.
        processingFlags - Processing flags, YuvFrame.PROCESSING_NONE for no processing.
        timestamp - The timestamp to give the frame.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

      • hasData

        public boolean hasData()

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap getBitmap()
        Converts this YUV frame to an ARGB_8888 Bitmap. Applies stored rotation. Remaning code based on http://stackoverflow.com/a/12702836 by rics (http://stackoverflow.com/users/21047/rics)
        返回:
        A new Bitmap containing the converted frame.
